response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $15,000 to me. Considering its immense worth to you, I am offering it to you for $14,000. This represents a significant saving of $1,000 compared to my standard pricing. I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and needs.", "product_price": 14000}
